channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023110040
item.description:
Report X-2023110040

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-19
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023110040 SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. Out carton ripped along one corner. DescribePack: Loose caps/failed inner seals on 6 x 16 oz DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin. 2. X-2023110041 SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. Side panel wet and ripped. DescribePack: Loose caps/failed inner seals on 6 x 16 oz plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin. 3. X-2023110042 SequenceEvent: wet pkg placed in bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. Carton saturated and corners ripped allowing contents to fall out. DescribePack: Loose caps/failed inner seals on 12 x 16 oz plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2023101409
item.description:
Report X-2023101409

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-19
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet pkg with non-compliant Flammable Liquid diamonds printed on outer carton with no orientation arrows and no UNPOP markings was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose pump heads on 14 x 8 oz plastic bottles and 1 x 8 oz plastic bottle is cracked all the way around the top of the bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in Hazmat bin.

Report X-2023101105

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin and sent to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose cap and failed inner seal on 1 x 6 qt plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023101067
item.description:
Report X-2023101067

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023101067 SequenceEvent: QA Frankie found package set aside in unload. Label identified as Corrossive so brought to cage to process as it was leaking DescribePack: Leaking internally DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Immediately brought to cage. 2. X-2023101094 SequenceEvent: Package was loaded onto truck but refused by customer; no sign of leakage at that time but taped up well. DescribePack: By time back to hub; pkg displayed significant leaking DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: upon arrival taken off truck and brought to cage and put in yellow bin to process.

item.title: Report X-2023101030
item.description:
Report X-2023101030

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was placed into a bin. DescribePack: The package due to the cap becoming loose from one of the bottles causing the liquid to leaked out of the package. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The package wad place into a red hazmat bin to prevent further leakage.

item.description:
Report X-2023101007

  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: CT

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS REMOVE FROM UNLOAD TRAILER BY AN MANAGER PUT ON A CART THEN BROUGHT TO HAZMAT CAGE DescribePack: THE CAPS LOOSENED SEALS FAILED NO HOLES OR CRACKS DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PUT IN TO A HAZMAT TOTE WITH BAG

item.title: Report X-2023100970
item.description:
Report X-2023100970

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: STRATFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: When driver reached destination, he noticed the hazmat package was leaking, (due to another package being on top) DescribePack: the body of the inner container was punctured allowing the liquid inside to leak DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was put into a hazmat safe bin and takin back to the station
